text: Enrique José Sarasola Marulanda (born 12 November 1963) is a Spanish equestrian. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics, the 1996 Summer Olympics and the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Spain Category:Equestrians at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Madrid
title: Enrique Sarasola Jr.
